name: Revenue
description:
The dice game of dreams! literally, the idea came to me in a dream. 

     Roll the dice 3 times after the first 2 rolls, choose whether the next number will be added or multiplied to the total score. At the end of the round your score will net you your revenue! how much you can get can be checked with the charts. 

Try to get $17.28 to win! But watch out, go bankrupt and you lose!

controls: 

z == start round

x == roll

left== add

right== multiply

down== view charts

up== view board
